short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Taking the FUD out of IT Security

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser plugin to uncyber your IT Security

Makes blogs, articles, and reports instantly more readable by changing over-used and cliche IT Security terms such as:

IoT becomes Cheap Connected Garbage
Machine Learning becomes Magic
GDPR becomes the MacGuffin
Cyber becomes IT.

**This is a just for fun plugin and will change all the matched text. Remember to turn it off if you're using the same browser to do work. You don't want to be sending the wrong text to your clients.** 


Current list of all phrases in v0.1

machine learning = Magic
Artificial Intelligence, AI = witchcraft
GDPR, 'general data protection regulationâ€™ = The MacGuffin
internet of things = cheap connected garbage
Evangelist = mouthpiece
Disruptive = boring
Blockchain = mythical tech
Cyber = IT
Gartner, Forrester, IDC, or 451 research = generic analyst firm
